refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: g_campaignFile sets the explicit campaign filename to use. Usually &et:name:abbr; will force a client to download any file on the server (either in the mod directory or etmain) which contains a .campaign file. If you want to change this behavior, you can filename to the specific campaign desired. Note that you must set this to the file's name, not the pk3's name.
